name: monies
description: The ultimate motivation tool. Display how much money you've made today at work, in the status bar.

commands.title: Monies: Toggle visibility of status widget

monies.annualIncome.description: Annual salary to base calculations off of. Overrides "monies.hourlyWage" if set.

monies.hourlyWage.description: Hourly income to base calculations off of.

monies.averageVacationDays.description: Average number of days taken off work (to adjust for in calculations)

monies.monetaryUnit.description: Unit to use when formatting live earnings. Accepts common strings like '$' or currency strings like 'euro', 'pound', 'yen', etc.

monies.showOnLoad.description: Whether to show the monies widget by default. It can be toggled with `Monies: toggle visibility of status widget` or by clicking the widget when it's visible.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
